action.action-desc: Mr. Hill (for himself and Mr. Kihuen) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 to modify requirements related to mortgage disclosures, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the TRID Improvement Act of 2017.
Section 4(a) of the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974 (12 U.S.C. 2603(a)) is amendedâ€”
